member.name: T:LogDemo.LogExtensions
member.summary: Extensions to help make logging awesome - this should be installed into the root namespace of your application

member.name: F:LogDemo.LogExtensions._dictionary
member.summary: Concurrent dictionary that ensures only one instance of a logger for a type.

member.name: M:LogDemo.LogExtensions.Log``1(``0)
member.param: The type to get the logger for.
member.returns: Instance of a logger for the object.

member.name: M:LogDemo.LogExtensions.Log(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the logger for the specified object name.
member.param: Either use the fully qualified object name or the short. If used with Log<T>() you must use the fully qualified object name"/>
member.returns: Instance of a logger for the object.
